items.summary: In the latest chapter of his Doctor Who 50th anniversary quest to interview someone connected with every single Doctor Who story, Toby Hadoke drops in on a man who met the Daleks and still came back to the series for more!
items.content_html: In the latest chapter of his Doctor Who 50th anniversary quest to interview someone connected with every single Doctor Who story, Toby Hadoke drops in on a man who met the Daleks and still came back to the series for more!

items.summary: Before heading off for a trip to the other side of the world, Nick Briggs found a bit of time to record a new podcast with Paul Spragg - where they announce the winners of the latest competition!

items.summary: It's the latest Who's Round, Toby Hadoke's Doctor Who 50th anniversary quest to interview someone who's been involved with every single Doctor Who story! This time, Toby makes across the water to chat to a man whose credits include both Doctor Who and The A-Team.
